thread.section_title: Medmastery Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Medmastery | www.medmastery.com
thread.title: Dmytro

author: Dmytro
title: Dmytro
text: Medmastery is an excellent educational resource for young doctors especially in field of cardiology who start to deal with contemporary modalities of patient clinical investigation. The material set out in the lessons is structured in a way that enables to make a clear algorithm of actions, which ground on understanding of the aims of the investigation, its limitations, possible results and future diagnostic and treatment tactic. These algorithms can easily be implemented in everyday life. Fact sheets give an opportunity to remind important issues quickly. And maybe one of the most important - lessons are very good illustrated with pictures and videos accompanied with clear explanations. These live cases and schemes make the education much more easier and very close to real clinical practice. So you can use the lessons as a tutor, virtual mentor and step by step acquire new knowledge and immediately utilize it everyday work.
